title: Demon Slayer
description: Test your knowledge of Tanjiro and the Demon Slayer Corps!

questions.question: What is the name of Tanjiro's signature breathing technique?
questions.explanation: Hinokami Kagura (Dance of the Fire God) is the breathing style passed down in Tanjiro's family, which is derived from Sun Breathing!

questions.question: Nezuko was turned into a demon by Muzan Kibutsuji.
questions.explanation: Muzan attacked the Kamado family and turned Nezuko into a demon, setting Tanjiro on his journey to find a cure.

questions.question: How many Hashira (Pillars) are there in the Demon Slayer Corps?
questions.explanation: There are 9 Hashira, each mastering a different breathing style!

questions.question: What is Zenitsu's only Thunder Breathing technique that he has mastered?
questions.explanation: Zenitsu only mastered the First Form but perfected it to an incredible degree!

questions.question: Inosuke wears a boar head mask because it belonged to his mother.
questions.explanation: Inosuke wears the head of the boar that raised him after his mother's death. The boar became his surrogate parent.

questions.question: Who is the leader of the Twelve Kizuki's Upper Ranks?
questions.explanation: Kokushibo (Upper Moon One) is the strongest of the Upper Ranks and was once a demon slayer himself!

questions.question: Tanjiro's earrings are Hanafuda earrings passed down in his family.
questions.explanation: The Hanafuda earrings were passed down through generations of Tanjiro's family along with the Hinokami Kagura dance.

questions.question: What color does Tanjiro's Nichirin sword turn?
questions.explanation: Tanjiro's blade turns black, which is considered rare and mysterious as black blades' properties are unknown.

questions.question: What is the name of the Flame Hashira who mentored Tanjiro?
questions.explanation: Kyojuro Rengoku, the Flame Hashira, inspired Tanjiro during the Mugen Train arc with his unwavering spirit and the words 'Set your heart ablaze!'

questions.question: Muzan Kibutsuji is the first demon and the source of all other demons.
questions.explanation: Muzan was turned into the first demon over 1000 years ago and all other demons originate from his blood.

questions.question: What special ability does Nezuko develop that is unique among demons?
questions.explanation: Nezuko becomes the first demon able to walk in sunlight, which makes Muzan desperate to capture her!

questions.question: Who is the Love Hashira?
questions.explanation: Mitsuri Kanroji is the Love Hashira, known for her unique Love Breathing style and incredible flexibility!

questions.question: Inosuke's breathing style is called Beast Breathing, which he created himself.
questions.explanation: Inosuke developed Beast Breathing on his own while living in the mountains, without any formal training!
